動物用藥品名稱: 雅碧雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎活毒混合疫苗
英文名稱: NEWCASTLE V.H. + BRONCHITIS H-120 STRAINS LIVE VACCINE
地址: 3 Hamelacha St. (P.O.B 489), West Industrial Zone, Beit-Shemesh,99100, Israel
效能(適應症): 雞：預防新城雞病及傳染性支氣管炎。
成分: COMPOSITION OF VACCINE:THE COMBINED BRONCHITIS - NEWCASTLE VACCINE IS A LYOPHILIZEDFORM OF THE VIRUSES, STABILIZED WITH SKIM MILK, LACTOSE ANDSODIUM GLUTAMATE AND PRESERVED WITH GENTAMYCIN. IT HAS A TITEROF I.B. VIRUS OF AT LEAST 10^3.5 EID50 PER BIRD DOSE AND A TITEROF N.D. VIRUS OF AT LEAST 10^6.0 EID50 PER BIRD DOSE
